sentences.english: His old legs and shoulders pivoted with the swinging of the pulling.
sentences.chinese: 他一把把地拉着，兩條老邁的腿兒和肩膀跟着轉動。
但很快，她挺直了她的肩膀。

sentences.english: So, in order to move fast, we have to stand on giants' shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 因此，爲了行動迅速，我們需要站在巨人的肩膀上。

sentences.english: Lie face down on the floor with your elbows bent and your palms next to your shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 臉朝地板向下，肘關節彎曲，手心靠近肩膀。

sentences.english: Gorillas are very fierce-looking, with broad shoulders, powerful arms, and pointed teeth.
sentences.chinese: 狒狒樣子兇猛，肩膀寬闊，手臂很長，牙齒尖銳。

sentences.english: If you feel sad you can cry on my shoulder…
sentences.chinese: 悶悶悶，下載那首在我的肩膀哭泣都下不到。

sentences.english: "But there is a lot of responsibility on your shoulders, " she adds.
sentences.chinese: 她補充道，‘但是你的肩膀上就會有很多責任。

sentences.english: Dad clapped him on the shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸拍了拍吉米的肩膀。

sentences.english: He grabbed the pack with the FENRIS warheads, and swung it over his shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 他抓起裝着芬里斯核彈頭的揹包，甩上了他的肩膀。

sentences.english: However, Nani will miss Portugal's trip to Liechtenstein after sustaining a shoulder injury.
sentences.chinese: 不過納尼因爲肩膀受傷不能去國家隊報到了。

sentences.english: She let her hair loose and it fell around her shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 她的頭髮一解開，便順着肩膀垂了下來。

sentences.english: Sagna has a shoulder injury that is still not completely clear.
sentences.chinese: 薩尼亞的肩膀有傷仍沒痊癒，但是他會首發。

sentences.english: Finally, Winter nuzzled up to her shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 最後，“冬天”用鼻子掘她的肩膀。

sentences.english: Gently run your nose and lips over her shoulders and neck smelling her. Say "Mmmmm… you smell good."
sentences.chinese: 溫柔地讓你的鼻子和嘴脣滑過她的肩膀和脖子。

sentences.english: Her bare shoulders were burned by the sun.
sentences.chinese: 她裸露的肩膀被太陽曬黑了。

definition: the back (human anatomy)/the back part of sth
knee/(Internet slang) to kneel down (in admiration)
